thread.title: Kanye West is Launching His Own Makeup Line, DONDA
thread.title_full: Kanye West is Launching His Own Makeup Line, DONDA

title: Kanye West is Launching His Own Makeup Line, DONDA
text:
Facebook PHOTO: JEWEL SAMAD 
Kanye West might finally be able to assume his deserved standing among the great brilliant minds he regularly compares himself to: Michaelangelo created the David, Steve Jobs created your iPhone, and Jesus Christ created Christianity as we know it, but not one of them had the creativity, foresight, and audacity to create their own makeup line. 
According to TMZ , the rapper and fashion designer has filed paperwork to launch a beauty brand called Donda—an admittedly endearing nod to his late mother who passed away in 2007—that might include makeup, perfume, lotions, and other cosmetics. 
Not much else is known at this time, but it's safe to say West is working on phase one of his ultimate goal of Renaissance Man, having tweeted an infographic last February explaining the “categories of influence” DONDA as a brand might take on, including transportation, wellness and learning. 
https://twitter.com/kanyewest/status/699108088687755264 
Also no word on whether the line will converge with sister-in-law Kylie Jenner's beauty brand (or create the same near-Dionysian frenzies when new products are released), but considering the 39-year-old proclaimed in 2013— and we quote —"I am Warhol. I am the number one most impactful artist of our generation. I am Shakespeare in the flesh. Walt Disney. Nike. Google," the makeup should be pretty spectacular. Keywords:
